name: Easy Twitter Personalization
description: Got tired of new all white twitter and other new changes? ? Bring back animated "Favorite" button. ► Bring back your twitter background. ► Hide "Who to follow" forever. ► Hide "Moments" tab. ► Disable "While you were away" feature. ► Disable "Profile card" on avatar hover. ► Tahoma® for Farsi and Arabic tweets. Any suggestions? Share it with me here.
additional_info: V1.0: ** Choose background image, position and color. Hide/Show "Who to follow" section. V1.1 ** Script won't bother on pages other than main and notification pages anymore. V1.2 ** Bug fixes in Mentions page. V1.3 ** Now you can disable new annoying "Profile card on hover" feature. V1.4 ** Background repeat feature added. V1.5 ** Minor bug fixed (now works in all resolutions). V1.6 ** Farsi and Arabic tweets are now in Tahoma®. V1.7 ** Now you can disable "While you were away" feature. V1.9 ** Don't like the new "Moments" tab? From now you can hide it. V2 ★ Bring back your Favorite button. There is a known issue with tooltip that I'm trying to solve. Stay updated. V2.01 ** Fixed the bug where the star icon didn't show for some users.
